sections.heading: Committee, defined.Committee means the visitors committee appointed as provided in section 81-3717 for the purpose of advising the county board in administering the County Visitors Promotion Fund and the County Visitors Improvement Fund established pursuant to such section and carrying out the purpo
sections.text: Committee, defined.Committee means the visitors committee appointed as provided in section 81-3717 for the purpose of advising the county board in administering the County Visitors Promotion Fund and the County Visitors Improvement Fund established pursuant to such section and carrying out the purposes of the Nebraska Visitors Development Act.SourceLaws 1980, LB 499, § 7;Laws 1988, LB 797, § 3;Laws 1989, LB 262, § 2;R.S.1943, (2008), § 81-1251;Laws 2012, LB1053, § 5.
